item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Canvas is a new way to write and code with ChatGPT (351 points | 218 comments)
2. Were RNNs All We Needed? (124 points | 38 comments)
3. Starlink offering free internet access for 30 days for Hurricane Helene victims (158 points | 103 comments)
4. Serving 70B-Scale LLMs Efficiently on Low-Resource Edge Devices [pdf] (156 points | 47 comments)
5. Dance training superior to physical exercise in inducing brain plasticity (2018) (153 points | 84 comments)
6. The Heart of Unix (2018) (10 points | discuss)
7. Image Editing with Gaussian Splatting (193 points | 46 comments)
8. Improving Accessibility Using Vision Models (16 points | 8 comments)
9. FLUX1.1 [pro] – New SotA text-to-image model from Black Forest Labs (128 points | 81 comments)
10. What Kind of Writer Is ChatGPT? (30 points | 16 comments)
11. Why Gumroad Didn't Choose Htmx (116 points | 50 comments)
12. Activeloop (YC S18) hiring an AI search engineer to ship fast, accurate search ( | hide)
13. Solving methane mysteries with satellite imagery (96 points | 18 comments)
14. Patent troll Sable pays up, dedicates all its patents to the public (567 points | 178 comments)
15. MikroPhone: A privacy enhanced, simple and featured RISC-V mobile phone (24 points | discuss)
16. Earth's ambipolar electrostatic field and its role in ion escape to space (11 points | 1 comment)
17. Tracking (C++) Shared Pointer Leaks (4 points | discuss)
18. I Solve Problems (talk at EuroBSDCon 2024) (20 points | 1 comment)
19. UK will give sovereignty of Chagos Islands to Mauritius (71 points | 68 comments)
20. Identification of officer from Sir John franklin's Northwest Passage expedition (8 points | 2 comments)
21. HTTrack Website Copier (4 points | discuss)
22. Google Says It Won't Follow Amazon's Lead with a Return-to-Office Mandate (21 points | 7 comments)
23. Discussing the Neptunian desert, savanna, and ridge (7 points | discuss)
24. Determinism in League of Legends: Implementation (2017) (76 points | 33 comments)
25. Modifications to GPU Hardware to Benefit Signed Distance Fields (47 points | 11 comments)
26. The latter half of October, the maintainer goes offline (43 points | 18 comments)
27. The forgotten story of Britain’s perilous bid to fly around the world (11 points | 2 comments)
28. Gamma radiation is produced in large tropical thunderstorms (140 points | 97 comments)
29. France's oldest treasure hunt has been solved (158 points | 35 comments)
30. US Dept of Energy announces $1.5B in electric grid improvements (8 points | 2 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 3, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
